feature: Themed HTML Export with Interactive Micro-Engagement

executiveSummary.goal: Enhance HTML export with theme-aware styling and interactive micro-engagement features
executiveSummary.currentState: HTML export exists with basic hardcoded grey styling
executiveSummary.approach: Add theme selection modal + generate CSS from theme palettes + add interactive UI elements
benefits: Exported notes match user's visual preferences
Interactive elements improve usability (light/dark toggle, copy buttons)
Consistent experience between app and exported files

microEngagementFeatures.definition: Small, delightful interactive elements that enhance user experience without overwhelming

features.name: Light/Dark Mode Toggle
features.description: Button in top-right to switch between light/dark variants of selected theme
features.engagement: User can view note in both modes after export

features.name: Copy Code Buttons
features.description: Hover-activated copy button on all code blocks

features.name: Smooth Scroll Navigation
features.description: Click headings in table of contents to scroll smoothly to section

features.name: Header Permalinks
features.description: Click heading to copy permalink to clipboard

features.name: Expandable Tables
features.description: Large tables collapse by default with 'Show more' button
features.engagement: Cleaner initial view, user controls complexity

options.label: Choose Theme
options.description: Pick a different theme for this export

picker.layout: Grid of theme cards (2 cols mobile, 3 cols desktop)
picker.preview: Each card shows theme colors (background, surface, text, tint)
picker.selection: Tap card ‚Üí close modal ‚Üí export with selected theme

cssGeneration.approach: Template literal with CSS variables from theme palette
